name: Lilies. Metamorphosis. Nostalgia.
description:
This time, in a dream, I was wandering through river lakes, surrounded by water lilies and nostalgic memories. 

This was not an easy path to take. It was difficult for me to move all the time, the surroundings engulfed and tightened, the bottom was soft, and I would fall through. 

Looking at the rich colors of the lilies and the reflections in the water from the surroundings, it was disturbing, but also impressionable. There were also the delicate outlines of women's faces among the flowers. I was reminded of Monet's work this morning. And I made the decision to create right away.
